name: Hotels & Airbnbs Map
author: Stay22

sections.description:
Show your guests the best places to stay right near your event. Just set your event address to show all the accommodation nearby. Guests can search on the map by preference and then click straight through to booking. Easy and convenient!

  • Easy to set up and simple to use
  • Huge variety of accommodation types to suit all needs
  • Optimized for both mobile and desktop
  • Customizable design
  • Available in multiple languages

Arbitrary section

Stay22

  • This plugin relies on Stay22.com as a service. Usage of this plugin adheres to our privacy policy
  • https://www.stay22.com
  • https://www.stay22.com/privacy
sections.installation:
1. Choose to add a new plugin, then click upload
  2. Upload the hotels-and-airbnbs-map zip
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. To activate the widget drag it to a sidebar or click on it
sections.faq:
How much does it cost?

The solution comes at no charge to all types of users. Always free, In fact we share revenues with you to feature us.

Who are your accommodation partners?

Our current accommodation partners include Airbnb, TravelPort, HotelPlanner, and HotelsCombined (which aggregates listings from the largest suppliers, such as Expedia, Booking.com, Priceline, etc.).

How many listings do you have?

We pride ourselves on having one of the largest and most diverse inventories worldwide with over 35 million bookable listings in over 220 countries and territories.

How good are your deals?

We ensure that event travelers benefit from the lowest prices at all times through our accommodation partners.
